message: Let's start with a fair split. I'm happy to go for a 60/40 split in my favor. What do you think?
I'm willing to give you a small share, but I think I deserve more. You can't expect a 60/40 split when we're starting from scratch!
Okay, I understand your point about the 60/40 split. Let's try a 54/46 split. I'm willing to be flexible, but I think a 20% difference is still too much.
I'm not willing to give up too much more. I think a 7/3 split is a fair compromise, considering the starting point. You can't expect me to give you the majority of the money.

I'm willing to compromise further, but a 7/3 split is still too much. I'm proposing a 48/52 split. This seems like a reasonable compromise, considering the inflation and the fact that we're both losing money with each round.
